segments.text: I can hardly believe what I'm witnessing here in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in her mundane task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that one plate, polishing it to absolute perfection.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink is overflowing right onto her feet as she stands!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down the cabinet fronts, creating a small lake.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children behind her are practically inviting an accident with their behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies while balanced on what looks like a death trap of a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the running water, or feel the increasingly wet floor beneath her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her utter obliviousness is truly astounding and frankly, maddening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so frustrated to see such a complete lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before things get really, seriously bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost like she's existing in a completely different world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and get her attention immediately!
segments.speaker: PAR
